allow:
Bash(python -c "
import pandas as pd

# 读取数据
df = pd.read_csv\(''rescued_data/merged_rescued_all.csv''\)

print\(''=== ses_self 分布分析 ===''\)
print\(df[''ses_self''].describe\(\)\)
print\(\)
print\(''=== 前20个最常见的值 ===''\)
print\(df[''ses_self''].value_counts\(\).head\(20\)\)
print\(\)
print\(''=== 值的范围分布 ===''\)
print\(''0-5:'', \(df[''ses_self''] <= 5\).sum\(\)\)
print\(''6-100:'', \(\(df[''ses_self''] > 5\) & \(df[''ses_self''] <= 100\)\).sum\(\)\)
print\(''100-2000:'', \(\(df[''ses_self''] > 100\) & \(df[''ses_self''] <= 2000\)\).sum\(\)\)
print\(''>2000:'', \(df[''ses_self''] > 2000\).sum\(\)\)
")
